import { useEffect } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { HeartIcon, EmojiSadIcon, UploadIcon, UserIcon, } from "@heroicons/react/outline"; import { MailIcon, EyeIcon } from "@heroicons/react/solid"; import { userProfileAction } from "../../../redux/slices/users/userSlices"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import DateFormatter from "../../../utils/DateFormatter"; export default function Profile({computedMatch: {params: {id}}}) { const dispatch = useDispatch(); //fetch user profile useEffect(() => { dispatch(userProfileAction(id)) }, [id, dispatch]) //user data from store const users = useSelector(state => state.users); const {profile, loading, appErr, serverErr} = users; return ( <>
{/* Static sidebar for desktop */}
{/* Profile header */}

{profile?.firstName} {profile?.lastName} {/* {profile?.accountType} */} {/* Display if verified or not */} {profile?.isAccountVerified ? Account Verified : Unverified Account }

Date Joined: {" "}

{profile?.posts.length} posts{" "} {profile?.followers.length} followers{" "} {profile?.following.length} following

{/* Who view my profile */}
{/* {profile?.viewedBy?.length}{" "} */} users viewed your profile
{/* is login user */} {/* Upload profile photo */} Upload Photo
{/* // Hide follow button from the same */}
<>
{/* Update Profile */} <> Update Profile {/* Send Mail */} Send Message

{profile?.lastName}Last Name

{/* Tabs */}

Who viewed my profile : 9

{/* Who view my post */}

    {/* {user?.firstName} {user?.lastName} */}Name

    {/* {user.accountType} */} Account Type

{/* All my Post */}

My Post

{/* Loo here */}

{/* {capitalizeWord(post?.title)} */}

{/* {post?.description} */}

{/* Read more */}
); }
